headline: Ask HN: How to create a command palette on a website like this?
description:
I came across this website with a status bar at the bottom. You can invoke it using ^+J and write your commands in it. I thought this is pretty cool and more websites should provide a pseudo-terminal interface for more advanced users. But I don't know how to do that. Do you know how to do it?

    https://nextjournal.com/
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 如何在这样的网站上创建一个命令调色板？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 如何在這樣的網站上創建一個命令調色板？
description_zh-Hans:
我遇到了这个网站，底部有一个状态栏。你可以用^+J来调用它，并在其中写下你的命令。I thought this is pretty cool and more websites should provide a pseudo-terminal interface for more advanced users. But I don't know how to do that. 你知道怎么做吗？

https://nextjournal.com/
description_zh-Hant:
我遇到了這個網站，底部有一個狀態欄。你可以用^+J來調用它，並在其中寫下你的命令。I thought this is pretty cool and more websites should provide a pseudo-terminal interface for more advanced users. But I don't know how to do that. 你知道怎麼做嗎？

https://nextjournal.com/
